page.name: DELIVERY_REQUEST_FORM
page.Resource: LEONARD BUILDINGS & TRUCK ACCESSORIES ● PO BOX 1728 ● 566 HOLLY SPRINGS CHURCH RD ● MT. AIRY, NC 27030 ●336-789-5018
Utility Lines, Fence, Unlevel Site, etc.
Please be specific: Landmarks, Street Numbers, Names, etc.
Will customer be present during delivery?
Customer must stake off area & door position
Must also fill out Move Job Disclaimer & attach to this form

Leonard is pleased to deliver our quality storage buildings with the understanding that the customer is responsible to have the delivery site ready to accept the building. The delivery truck and trailer often require more room than anticipated. The customer is responsible to check for low wires, tree limbs and branches, as well as septic systems, sprinkler systems and other unmarked utility lines. We will not be responsible for damages done to the building or the customer’s property due to the site not being ready or accessible. The customer is responsible to remove any fences or obstacles that need to be moved to allow for a truck and trailer to safely place the building. Because of the size of the delivery equipment, some lawn damage will occur and Leonard will not be held responsible. When possible, Leonard Buildings will place the building where you want it, but, if in our professional judgment, the location is not advisable or extremely difficult and the customer insists on the location, the customer will be responsible for any additional costs, including labor, additional block, and in the event of complications, the cost of a tow service, crane or repairs to unmarked utility lines.
Leonard Buildings provides FREE delivery of your Leonard building, with the understanding noted above. Please note the following information:
Delivery is free within 30 miles from the store - beyond that will incur a charge of $4.00 per loaded mile.

Normal estimated time to deliver and setup a building upon arriving at the customer’s address is one (1) hour. In the event that the building delivery cannot be completed in one (1) hour due to complications, additional labor charges at a rate of $70 per man-hour will be assessed.
Leonard will provide one row of block at no charge. If additional blocks are needed, they are available for $2.00 per block. The customer can provide their own supplemental block as well.

It is best to have your building on a level site. We will level a building but do NOT recommend blocking a building over three (3) blocks high under more than 25% of the building. The customer is responsible for any damages to the building that may result due to exceeding this blocking recommendation. Above the 3 block level requires the use of double block piers for which there is an additional cost.

If the building cannot be delivered upon arriving at the site and it is beyond the control of Leonard Buildings, the building can be left at the address and, for an additional charge of $70, delivery can be rescheduled when the site is ready.
If the building has to be returned to the retail location and re-delivered, standard Move Job rates will be used. See the sales person for details on this cost.

Upon completion of the delivery, the customer will sign the Customer Acceptance Form, at which time any concerns or problems with the building, not the result of difficult delivery conditions, should be documented so they can be cared for in a timely manner.
Additional delivery charges incurred can be paid to the driver at the time of delivery or paid at the retail store.

Special orders that are cancelled while in progress shall incur a charge for the pro-rated portion of the cost of the item in production but not less than 25% of the quoted price. Change requests will be treated as a cancellation if production on the unit is in process. If production has not started, customer will only be charged for actual expenses resulting from any non-stock raw material procured plus 10% restocking fee. Your refund, less fee charges, will be mailed (or credit card will be credited) from the corporate office within 7 business days of refund request approval.
Building size in the part number references a nominal measurement. Actual dimensions will be less.
Customer is solely responsible for obtaining any necessary building permits and understanding local zoning statutes that might affect their property.

By checking this box, I acknowledge that Leonard reserves the right to cancel a delivery due to bad weather or other unfavorable conditions. If the customer insists on delivery in spite of this professional recommendation, the
for any additional costs including towing services or damages that may be incurred to the customer’s property or to Leonard delivery equipment.
Was Customer Acceptance Form completed and signed by customer?
Customer Signature - Customer understands & accepts terms of agreement
Thank you for filling delivery info. Your application is now In-Progress
Thank you for filling delivery info. Your application is now In-Progress but the system can't send mail at the moment.

page.Resource: LEONARD BUILDINGS & TRUCK ACCESSORIES ● PO BOX 1728 ● 566 HOLLY SPRINGS CHURCH RD ● MT. AIRY, NC 27030 ● 336-789-5018

Delivery is free within 30 miles from store - beyond that incurs a charge of $4.00/loaded mile.

Normal estimated time to set up a building upon arriving at customer’s address is one (1) hour. In the event that building setup cannot be completed in one (1) hour, additional labor charges at a rate of $70/man-hour will be assessed.
Leonard Buildings will provide one row of block at no charge. If additional blocks are needed, they are available for $2.00/block. Customer can also provide their own supplemental block.
Yes, I did receive my Leonard Building Warranty Registration Form.
